steps: Review and understand the provided test cases and scenarios.
Set up the testing environment with the specified testing framework (Mocha or Jest).
Implement the test scripts as described in the automation strategy.
Run the automated tests to verify the API endpoints.
Ensure MongoDB connection is established and functioning correctly.
Analyze test results and make necessary adjustments to the API or test scripts.
Document the test results and any issues encountered.
monitoringSetup: Monitor the API endpoints for any discrepancies or errors post-deployment. Set up alerts for any failed test cases or unexpected API responses.
